Something only you can do, .

Not all the guardian machines of the Refuge shut down when they should have. {@LinkCreature:71#3007#Bakra} will direct you.

Just the I need!

The gods put this place off limits when Balder died. Put machines in here that build iskaragards. They all shut down when the gods allowed us back in.

Almost all. An iskaragard almost killed me this morning. Can you hunt it down?
Thank you, hero. I'd be more lenient if it attacked the sloths as well!

Can't prune the vines if that thing cuts me in two.

You're a great help, .

These things were built to last. Amazing that they're even around to malfunction!

Our teams still haven't found whatever replaces them.
